member.name: WICPngTimeProperties
member.summary: Specifies the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) tIME chunk metadata properties.

member.name: WICPngTimeProperties.WICPngTimeYear
member.summary: [VT_UI2] Indicates the year of the last modification.

member.name: WICPngTimeProperties.WICPngTimeMonth
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates the month of the last modification.

member.name: WICPngTimeProperties.WICPngTimeDay
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates day of the last modification.

member.name: WICPngTimeProperties.WICPngTimeHour
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates the hour of the last modification.

member.name: WICPngTimeProperties.WICPngTimeMinute
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates the minute of the last modification.

member.name: WICPngTimeProperties.WICPngTimeSecond
member.summary: [VT_UI1] Indicates the second of the last modification.
